content: our july makers kit is not a shawl cowl or hat it s just a basket the basket is 8 tall an 8 in diameter we love the loop and closure detail too so you can close it up if you want to bring it along somewhere and use it like a yarn bowl if you want to see our kits click here 1 there is also a knit version find that here 2 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/its-just-a-basket-x83626739 htm 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/its-just-a-knit-basket
